info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 4:28PM CDT until August 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Hidalgo.
* WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harlingen, Weslaco, Alamo, Donna, Mercedes, Elsa, Edcouch, La Villa, Olivarez, Mila Doce, Maria Alicia P Munoz Elementary School, Lyndon B Johnson Elementary School, Midway North, Elsa Police Department, Weslaco Mid Valley Airport, Edcouch- Elsa High School, Edcouch Volunteer Fire Department, Edcouch City Hall, Satiago Garcia Elementary School and Edcouch Police Department. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT THIS EVENING
